column1: Well you done done me and you bet I felt it
column2: 好吧，我想你一定知道我已经感受到你所做的一切
column3: I tried to be chill but you’re so hot that I melted
column4: 想要冷静的我奈何敌不过你的热情
column5: I fell right through the cracks
column6: 这感觉如同蹦极般奇妙
column7: and now I’m trying to get back
column8: 而我现在开始尝试着回归现实
column9: Before the cool done run out
column10: 在我的冲动尚未冷却之前
column11: I’ll be giving it my bestest
column12: 我会拼尽全力(赢得你的心)
column13: Nothing’s going to stop me but divine intervention
column14: (我发誓)除非天生异象否则绝不停止
column15: I reckon it’s again my turn to win some or learn some
column16: 估计这正是我证明自己的机会吧
column17: But I won’t hesitate no more
column22: 一刻也不能再等，我会是你的
column23: Well open up your mind and see like me
column24: 好吧，敞开心扉像我一样的注视（对方）
column25: Open up your plans and damn you’re free
column26: 忘记该死的计划吧，(从现在起)你自由了
column27: Look into your heart and you’ll find love love love
column28: 在你的内心深处，你会发现那里充满了爱
column29: Listen to the music of the moment people
column31: 当音乐响起，要不要跟我一唱一和
column34: And it's our God-forsaken right to be loved loved loved loved loved
column35: 你拥有爱与被爱这被神所抛弃的权利
column36: So I won't hesitate no more
column41: 一刻也不能再等，我已完全确定
column53: 你会愿意吗？但你愿意吗？
column54: But do you want to come on
column58: And I will nibble your ear
column60: I've been spending way too long checking my tongue in the mirror
column61: 我已经花太多时间对着镜子检查我的舌头
column62: And bending over backwards just to try to see it clearer
column63: 并且将我的舌头向后弯曲仅仅为了能够看得更清楚些
column64: But my breath fogged up the glass
column65: 但是我呼出的雾气使镜面模糊不清
column66: And so I drew a new face and I laughed
column67: 我笑着在上面画上一张新脸
column68: I guess what I be saying is there ain't no better reason
column69: 我想没有任何更好的理由来表达我正在说的
column70: To rid yourself of vanities and just go with the seasons
column71: 为了丢开心中的杂念，就让它随着时间的改变而流逝
column72: It's what we aim to do
column75: 我们的名字即我们的优势
column76: But I won't hesitate no more
column78: 但是我不会犹豫踌躇，不会，不会
column81: 一刻也不能等，我会是你的
column82: and open up your mind and see like me
column83: 好吧，敞开你的心扉像我一样的注视
column84: Open up your plans and damn you're free
column85: 忘记该死的计划吧，从现在起你自由了
column86: Look into your heart and you'll find that the sky is yours
column87: 感受你的心灵深处，你会发现整片天空都是属于你的
column91: 所以请不要，请不要，请不要
column93: 没有任何将事情复杂化的必要
column95: 因为我们有的时间不多
column99: 这是，这是 ，这就是我们的命运，
